LanguageData.ArcherHasMeleeWeaponDesc: An Archer has a melee weapon and it is making them unhappy!
LanguageData.DemoExpertHasNonExplosiveDesc: A Demolitions expert has a weapon that isn't an explosive and it's making them unhappy!
LanguageData.EkrixiphobiaHasExplosiveDesc: An ekrixiphobiac has an explosive and it is terrifying them!
